content: round 12 chain 3 double_crochet into each st around working 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet into each corner join with slip_stitch into top of first chain 3 round 13 chain 3 double_crochet into each st around working 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet into each corner join with slip_stitch into top of first chain 3 note you can make this into a 6 inch square by working rounds 1-6 as written and then work single_crochet in round 7 instead of double_crochet
